postgres-password.description: Password for postgres superuser. This should be changed! Defaults to dcospostgres.

port.description: The port number of the database server. Defaults to 5432.

memory-mb.description: The amount of memory allocated for the database server in MB. Defaults to 512MB.

connections.description: Number of connections allowed concurrently open. Defaults to 200.

host-data-volume.description: Location on slave node of Postgres data directory. For cluster wide persistence this should be a network shared volume and allow ownership to postgres:postgres (995:995). Defaults to /var/lib/postgres.
